questions.question: Hoeveel mense is dood en beseer?
Was daar enige helde- of reddingsdade?
Kry kommentaar van bure, ooggetuies.
Hoeveel brandweerwaens en brandbestryders was betrokke?
Bronne:
questions.description: Brandweerhoof, polisie, nooddienste, hospitaal, forensiese dienste, maatskaplike dienste

questions.question: Watter besonderhede is daar van slagoffers?
questions.description: Name, ouderdomme, adresse, ander persoonlike inligting.

questions.question: Waar was die brand en wat het gebrand ('n gebou, huis, veld, ens.)?
Wanneer het die brand begin, waar en hoe het dit versprei?
Wanneer en na hoe lank is dit onder beheer gebring?
Hoe is slagoffers gedood en beseer en wat die omvang van die beserings?
Eiendoms verlies:
questions.description: wat is die omvang die skade, versekering? Jy sal dalk â€˜n kenner moet kontak.

questions.question: Ondersoek:
Waarheen is die beseerdes en oorledenes geneem?
Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
How many people are dead and injured?
Were there any acts of bravery or any rescues?
Get comments from neighbours, eyewitnesses.
How many fire engines and firefighters involved?
Sources:
questions.description: Fire chief, police, rescue services, hospital, mortuary, welfare agencies

questions.question: What is the identification of victims?
questions.description: Names, ages, addresses, other personal information.

questions.question: Where was the fire and what was burning (a building, house, field, etc.)?
When did the fire start, where and how did it spread?
When and after how long was it brought under control?
How were victims killed and injured and what is the extent of the injuries?
Property loss:
questions.description: what is the extent, cost of damage, insurance? You may need to phone an expert.

questions.question: Investigation:
Where were the injured and dead taken?
Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
